languages.text: {n}За время расследования леди Сюэ смогла установить, что генетические изменения в организмах немочей были вызваны влиянием загадочных веществ, выделяемых в воду ксенообелисками. До недавнего времени вещества эти в воде точно отсутствовали, что показали анализы Магос Биологис. Эти же ксенообелиски оказались связаны цепью энергетических коммуникаций, они же служили источниками неизвестного излучения, вызвавшего вспышку скверны в ныне неподконтрольном секторе планеты, а также появление загадочных фантомов.{/n}

{n}During her investigation, Lady Xue was able to establish that the genetic changes in the retches' bodies were caused by mysterious substances secreted into the water by xeno-obelisks. These substances did not contaminate the water until recently, as shown by the analysis of the Magos Biologis. The same xeno-obelisks appear to be linked by a chain of energy communications, also serving as sources of unknown radiation that seem to have caused the outbreak of contaminated growth in the currently uncontrolled sector of the planet. This also seems to be causing the appearance of the mysterious phantoms.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}За время расследования леди Сюэ смогла установить, что генетические изменения в организмах немочей были вызваны влиянием загадочных веществ, выделяемых в воду ксенообелисками. До недавнего времени вещества эти в воде точно отсутствовали, что показали анализы Магос Биологис. Эти же ксенообелиски оказались связаны цепью энергетических коммуникаций, они же служили источниками неизвестного излучения, вызвавшего вспышку скверны в ныне неподконтрольном секторе планеты, а также появление загадочных фантомов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}During her investigation, Lady Xue has been able to establish that the genetic changes in the organisms of the sickly creatures have been caused by the effects of mysterious substances secreted into the water by xeno-obelisks. These substances did not previously contaminated the water until recently, as shown by the analysis of the Magos Biologis. The same xeno-obelisks appeared to be linked by a chain of energy communications, also serving as the sources of unknown radiation that caused an outbreak of corruption in the currently uncontrolled sector of the planet, as well as the appearance of mysterious phantoms.{/n}

languages.text: {n}通过调查，薛女士得出了这样的结论：丑恶种的躯体突变，来源于异形方尖碑向水中分泌的某种神秘物质。这些物质之前并没有污染水源，直到最近才在生物贤者的报告中显示出其污染性。同样的异形方尖碑似乎通过某种通讯链联结在一起，继而爆发了某种未知的辐射。这样的辐射导致行星尚未纳入控制的区域爆发腐化，还出现了神秘的幽灵。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}During her investigation, Lady Xue was able to establish that the genetic changes in the retches' bodies were caused by mysterious substances secreted into the water by xeno-obelisks. These substances did not contaminate the water until recently, as shown by the analysis of the Magos Biologis. The same xeno-obelisks appear to be linked by a chain of energy communications, also serving as sources of unknown radiation that seem to have caused the outbreak of contaminated growth in the currently uncontrolled sector of the planet. This also seems to be causing the appearance of the mysterious phantoms.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}通过调查，薛女士得出了这样的结论：丑恶种的躯体突变，来源于异形方尖碑向水中分泌的某种神秘物质。这些物质之前并没有污染水源，直到最近才在生物贤者的报告中显示出其污染性。同样的异形方尖碑似乎通过某种通讯链联结在一起，继而爆发了某种未知的辐射。这样的辐射导致行星尚未纳入控制的区域爆发腐化，还出现了神秘的幽灵。{/n}
{n}通过调查，薛女士得出了这样的结论：病变生物体内发生了基因突变，这是由于异形方尖碑向水中分泌了某种神秘物质。这些物质之前并没有污染水源，直到最近才在生物贤者的报告中显示出其污染性。同样的异形方尖碑似乎通过某种通讯链联结在一起，继而爆发了某种未知的辐射。这样的辐射导致行星尚未纳入控制的区域爆发腐化，还出现了神秘的幽灵。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Durante su investigación, lady Xue ha podido averiguar que los cambios genéticos en los organismos de los mutantes provienen de misteriosas sustancias que los xenobeliscos expulsan al agua. Estas sustancias no habían contaminado el agua hasta hace poco, como demuestran los análisis de la Magos Biologis. Los mismos xenobeliscos parecen estar unidos por una cadena de comunicaciones energéticas, que sirve también como fuente de la radiación desconocida que, aparentemente, ha provocado el brote de crecimiento contaminado en el sector actualmente indómito del planeta. Esto también parece ser el origen de la aparición de los misteriosos fantasmas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}During her investigation, Lady Xue was able to establish that the genetic changes in the retches' bodies were caused by mysterious substances secreted into the water by xeno-obelisks. These substances did not contaminate the water until recently, as shown by the analysis of the Magos Biologis. The same xeno-obelisks appear to be linked by a chain of energy communications, also serving as sources of unknown radiation that seem to have caused the outbreak of contaminated growth in the currently uncontrolled sector of the planet. This also seems to be causing the appearance of the mysterious phantoms.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Durante su investigación, lady Xue ha podido averiguar que los cambios genéticos en los organismos de los mutantes provienen de misteriosas sustancias que los xenobeliscos expulsan al agua. Estas sustancias no habían contaminado el agua hasta hace poco, como demuestran los análisis de la Magos Biologis. Los mismos xenobeliscos parecen estar unidos por una cadena de comunicaciones energéticas, que sirve también como fuente de la radiación desconocida que, aparentemente, ha provocado el brote de crecimiento contaminado en el sector actualmente indómito del planeta. Esto también parece ser el origen de la aparición de los misteriosos fantasmas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}レディ・シュエは調査の過程で、病弱な生物の遺伝子の変化は、ゼノのオベリスクが水中に分泌した謎の物質の影響によるものであることを突き止めた。生物学賢人の分析が示すように、これらの物質は最近まで水を汚染してはいなかった。同じく、ゼノのオベリスクはエネルギー通信の鎖でつながっているようで、現在、惑星上で制御されていないセクターで、汚染の拡大を引き起こしていると思われる、正体不明の放射線の発生源にもなっている。さらにこれが、謎の幻を出現させているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}During her investigation, Lady Xue was able to establish that the genetic changes in the retches' bodies were caused by mysterious substances secreted into the water by xeno-obelisks. These substances did not contaminate the water until recently, as shown by the analysis of the Magos Biologis. The same xeno-obelisks appear to be linked by a chain of energy communications, also serving as sources of unknown radiation that seem to have caused the outbreak of contaminated growth in the currently uncontrolled sector of the planet. This also seems to be causing the appearance of the mysterious phantoms.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}レディ・シュエは調査の過程で、病弱な生物の遺伝子の変化は、ゼノのオベリスクが水中に分泌した謎の物質の影響によるものであることを突き止めた。生物学賢人の分析が示すように、これらの物質は最近まで水を汚染してはいなかった。同じく、ゼノのオベリスクはエネルギー通信の鎖でつながっているようで、現在、惑星上で制御されていないセクターで、汚染の拡大を引き起こしていると思われる、正体不明の放射線の発生源にもなっている。さらにこれが、謎の幻を出現させているようだ。{/n}

{n}レディ・シュエは調査の過程で、病弱な生物の遺伝子の変化は、ゼノのオベリスクが水中に分泌した謎の物質の影響によるものであることを突き止めた。生物学賢人の分析が示すように、これらの物質は最近まで水を汚染してはいなかった。同じく、ゼノのオベリスクはエネルギー通信の鎖でつながっているようで、現在、惑星上で制御されていないセクターで、汚染の拡大を引き起こしていると思われる、正体不明の放射線の発生源にもなっている。さらにこれが、謎の幻を出現させているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'enquête de dame Xue établit que les modifications génétiques ayant altéré les infâmes avaient été provoquées par les mystérieuses substances sécrétées dans l'eau par les obélisques xénos. Comme le montre l'analyse des Magos Biologis, ces substances n'ont contaminé l'eau que récemment. Ces mêmes obélisques semblent être reliés entre eux par un réseau de communication à haute énergie qui émet des radiations inconnues ; ce sont vraisemblablement ces dernières qui auraient provoqué la croissance végétale incontrôlée ayant frappé la région encore vierge de la planète. Il semble également que ces facteurs soient à l'origine de l'apparition mystérieuse des spectres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}During her investigation, Lady Xue was able to establish that the genetic changes in the retches' bodies were caused by mysterious substances secreted into the water by xeno-obelisks. These substances did not contaminate the water until recently, as shown by the analysis of the Magos Biologis. The same xeno-obelisks appear to be linked by a chain of energy communications, also serving as sources of unknown radiation that seem to have caused the outbreak of contaminated growth in the currently uncontrolled sector of the planet. This also seems to be causing the appearance of the mysterious phantoms.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'enquête de dame Xue établit que les modifications génétiques ayant altéré les infâmes avaient été provoquées par les mystérieuses substances sécrétées dans l'eau par les obélisques xénos. Comme le montre l'analyse des Magos Biologis, ces substances n'ont contaminé l'eau que récemment. Ces mêmes obélisques semblent être reliés entre eux par un réseau de communication à haute énergie qui émet des radiations inconnues ; ce sont vraisemblablement ces dernières qui auraient provoqué la croissance végétale incontrôlée ayant frappé la région encore vierge de la planète. Il semble également que ces facteurs soient à l'origine de l'apparition mystérieuse des spectres.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Im Rahmen ihrer Untersuchung konnte Lady Xue beweisen, dass die genetischen Veränderungen im Körper der Speier durch mysteriöse, von Xeno-Obelisken in das Wasser abgegebene, Substanzen ausgelöst wurden. Diese Substanzen haben das Wasser aber erst kürzlich kontaminiert, wie die Analyse des Magos Biologis zeigte. Diese Xeno-Obelisken scheinen durch eine Kette von Energienachrichten miteinander verbunden zu sein, die auch Quelle einer unbekannten Strahlung ist. Diese Strahlung hat im derzeit unkontrollierten Sektor des Planeten für kontaminiertes Wachstum gesorgt. Das scheint auch die Erscheinung der mysteriösen Phantome ausgelöst zu haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}During her investigation, Lady Xue was able to establish that the genetic changes in the retches' bodies were caused by mysterious substances secreted into the water by xeno-obelisks. These substances did not contaminate the water until recently, as shown by the analysis of the Magos Biologis. The same xeno-obelisks appear to be linked by a chain of energy communications, also serving as sources of unknown radiation that seem to have caused the outbreak of contaminated growth in the currently uncontrolled sector of the planet. This also seems to be causing the appearance of the mysterious phantoms.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Im Rahmen ihrer Untersuchung konnte Lady Xue beweisen, dass die genetischen Veränderungen im Körper der Speier durch mysteriöse, von Xeno-Obelisken in das Wasser abgegebene, Substanzen ausgelöst wurden. Diese Substanzen haben das Wasser aber erst kürzlich kontaminiert, wie die Analyse des Magos Biologis zeigte. Diese Xeno-Obelisken scheinen durch eine Kette von Energienachrichten miteinander verbunden zu sein, die auch Quelle einer unbekannten Strahlung ist. Diese Strahlung hat im derzeit unkontrollierten Sektor des Planeten für kontaminiertes Wachstum gesorgt. Das scheint auch die Erscheinung der mysteriösen Phantome ausgelöst zu haben.{/n}

{n}Während ihrer Ermittlungen konnte Lady Xue die Ursache für die genetischen Veränderungen im Organismus der kranken Kreaturen identifizieren. Sie wurden durch mysteriöse Substanzen ausgelöst, die von den Xeno-Obelisken ins Wasser sickerten. Diese Substanzen haben das Wasser aber erst seit kurzem kontaminiert, wie die Analyse des Magos Biologis zeigte. Diese Xeno-Obelisken scheinen durch eine Kette von Energienachrichten miteinander verbunden zu sein, die auch Quelle einer unbekannten Strahlung ist. Diese Strahlung hat in dem momentan unkontrollierten Sektor des Planeten für kontaminiertes Wachstum gesorgt. Das scheint auch die Erscheinung der mysteriösen Phantome ausgelöst zu haben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Leydi Xue; araştırmaları esnasında hastalıklı leşlerin cesetlerindeki genetik değişikliklerin, zeno dikili taşlarının suya karıştırdığı gizemli maddeler yüzünden ortaya çıktığını tespit edebildi. Bu maddeler, Magos Biyologis'in analizlerinde gösterildiği üzere kısa süre öncesine kadar suyu kirletmemişlerdi. Aynı zeno dikili taşları, bir dizi enerji iletişimiyle bağlantılı gibi görünüyor. Aynı zamanda bilinmeyen bir radyasyonun kaynağı niteliği taşıyorlar. Bu da mevcut durumda gezegenin kontrol altında olmayan sektöründeki hastalıklı büyüme salgınına neden olmuş gibi görünüyor. Ayrıca gizemli hayaletlerin ortaya çıkışının da nedeni buymuş gibi duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}During her investigation, Lady Xue was able to establish that the genetic changes in the retches' bodies were caused by mysterious substances secreted into the water by xeno-obelisks. These substances did not contaminate the water until recently, as shown by the analysis of the Magos Biologis. The same xeno-obelisks appear to be linked by a chain of energy communications, also serving as sources of unknown radiation that seem to have caused the outbreak of contaminated growth in the currently uncontrolled sector of the planet. This also seems to be causing the appearance of the mysterious phantoms.{/n}
